text:
The filter man page - 

   http://ant.apache.org/manual/CoreTasks/filter.html

Does NOT make mention of the fact the process can corrupt binary files.

The only place I see that warning is here:

   http://ant.apache.org/manual/using.html 

   "Warning: If you copy binary files with filtering turned on, you can corrupt
the files. This feature should be used with text files only."

I would like to see a similar warning message added to the filter man page.

It sure would have saved me a lot of time trying to figure out where/how my
keystores were being corrupted.
